text: awlyk aladhin atsfu balsfat alssabiqat min eibad alrhmn, ythabwn 'aelaa manazil aljnt; birahmat allah wbsbb sbrhm ealaa altaeat, wsayulaqqawn fi aljanat altahiat waltslym min almlaykt, walhayat altayibat walslamt min alafat, khalidin fiha abdana min ghyr mwt, hasunat mstqrana yaqirrun fih wmqamana yuqimun bh, la yabghun eanha thwla
